install.name: My Listings
install.author: JoomlaXTC
install.description: Display user entries on mosTree component.

param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Causes this application to not appearin the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin

param.name: maxqty
param.label: Maximum Items
param.description: Maximum number of entries to display.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Instructions:
param.default: Enter the HTML code to use for each entry. You can use the following tags to include link information: {name} {desc} {hits} {votes} {rating} {email} {website} {price} {url} {cdate}.
